Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Komishovka and Ptich...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦 - Russian forces have captured 105.5 sqkm in just the Pokrovsk direction in the past 6 days. 8.8km remain till Krasnoarmeysk / Pokrovsk. 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces have captured Komishovka and Ptichoe and are on the northern outskirts of Kalinovoe – Pokrovsk direction.There are reports that the battle of Novogrodovka has begun with Russian troops entering the large town. At the moment it is unknown whether Russian forces entered from the south or from the north.

Title: ↩️🖼 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces advanced in multiple areas in the ...
Description: Rerum Novarum // Intel, Breaking News, and Alerts: 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Visual confirmation: Russian forces have advanced to the Vodyanoe fortification – Mariinka-Ugledar direction. The vital fortification guards the Vodyanoe road and 00532 highway intersection. If lost, it will completely cut all supply routes to Ugledar.… 🇷🇺🇺🇦⚡- Russian forces advanced in multiple areas in the Ugledar direction.Russian forces advanced inside Konstantinovka and are less than 300 meters from the center of the town. Russian troops also captured the large trench system north of Nikolskoe.Russian forces have advanced beyond the 00532, Konstantinovka-Ugledar, highway. Only 3.8km remain till Russian troops reach the vital intersection which will cut all Ugledar's supply.
